com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions.segmentation

Interface SegmentationExtensionView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SegmentationComposite, SegmentationPanel

    public interface SegmentationExtensionView
    The SegmentationExtensionView is used to display the segmentation settings in option dialog. For each GUI framework an own implementation is needed. For Swing and SWT implementations are provided by Acrolinx.
